title: Anastasios Sidiropoulos
contents:
Anastasios (Tasos) Sidiropoulos       I am an associate professor at the Computer Science department in the University of Illinois at Chicago , where I am part of the Theory Group . I did my Ph.D at the MIT ,
advised by Piotr Indyk .
